title: Reputation
description: Used to level up guilds.

title: In Inventory
description: Amount currently in your inventory.

title: Inventory Sorting
description: Sort your inventory by tier, type, and then rarity.

title: Bank Storage Sorting
description: Sort your bank by tier, type, and then rarity.

title: Watch an Ad for a Reward
description: Watch a short advertisement and receive a reward for your time.

title: #name#
description: #description#

title: #goldComma# Gold
description: The amount of gold this recipe is worth.

title: #value# Gold
description: Standard currency used for purchases.

title: Crafting Time
description: The amount of time needed to craft this recipe.

title: Recipe Rarity
description: The minimum rarity this recipe will craft at.

title: Remaining Craft Time
description: The amount of time remaining before this recipe is crafted.

title: Missing Required Materials
description: You do not have the required materials needed to craft this recipe.

title: Fuse Time
description: The amount of time needed to complete the fusion of this recipe.

title: Recipe Level
description: This is the level of this recipe.

title: Item Level
description: This is the level of this item.

title: Star Rating
description: Increases the stats of this item.

title: Common Rarity
description: This item is of Common rarity.

title: Good Rarity
description: This item is of Good rarity.

title: Great Rarity
description: This item is of Great rarity.

title: Epic Rarity
description: This item is of Epic rarity.

title: Health
description: The amount of damage an entity can sustain before being downed.

title: Power
description: The amount of damage an entity is capable of dealing.

title: #name#
description:
#description# You have #amt#.

#flavor#

title: #name# Cost Removed
description: Mastering this recipe has removed this material cost.

title: Contribute Manually from Inventory
description: Manually contributing from this menu will allow you to contribute higher rarity items.

title: Auto-Contribute to Orders
description: Enabling this feature will auto-contribute items to this order if they meet the requirements.

title: Order Parts
description: Orders can be made up of multiple parts. Complete all parts to complete the order.

title: Shop Recipes
description: When a Shop Order is empty, you can select one of the available recipes below to permanently learn it allowing you to finish a new Shop Order. Choose wisely!

title: Mastery
description: Mastering recipes removes their mastery cost permanently and doubles their exceptional craft chances for all rarities. There's a minimum amount to craft before a recipe can be mastered, and each additional craft beyond that reduces the material cost to master (down to 0).

title: Cogsmith Worker
description: Specific workers are used in crafting and allocated automatically

title: Jeweler Worker
description: Specific workers are used in crafting and allocated automatically

title: Armorer Worker
description: Specific workers are used in crafting and allocated automatically

title: Weaponmaker Worker
description: Specific workers are used in crafting and allocated automatically

title: View in Recipes
description: Redirects directly to this recipe's details.

title: Remove Slotted Equipment
description: This will remove the currently equipped item on this slot and return it to your inventory.

title: Gear Upgrade Available
description: This item is an upgrade to gear equipped on another hero.

title: View Hero Playbooks
description: Selected Playbook: #name#

title: Feature Locked
description: Build the Tinker Hut to unlock this feature.

title: Lv#levelText# #name#
description: #trophyTooltip#

title: Removed Slotted Forge
description: This will remove the currently slotted item for forging and return it to your inventory.

title: Forge Enhancement
description: The enhancement level of this item. You can enhance items in the Forge building.

title: Remove Slotted Fusion
description: This will remove the currently slotted fusion and return the items to your inventory.

title: Cancel Active Fusion
description: This will cancel the currently active fusion and items will not be returned.

title: Available Fortune Slots
description: The number of fortune slots you have available for offerings.

title: Remove Slotted Offering
description: This will remove the currently slotted offering and return the item to your inventory.

title: Remove Active Fortune
description: This will remove the currently active fortune.

title: Research Time
description: The amount of time needed to increment this trinket research.

title: Research Level
description: The level of this trinket research.

title: Contribution Rarity: Common
description: This section requires items of Common rarity.

title: Contribution Rarity: Good
description: This section requires items of Good rarity.

title: Contribution Rarity: Great
description: This section requires items of Great rarity.

title: Contribution Rarity: Epic
description: This section requires items of Epic rarity.

title: #name#
description: #description#

title: Dungeon Not Available
description: Defeat bosses to unlock harder dungeons with new materials.

title: Boss Dungeon Not Available
description: Defeating the boss previous to this dungeon will unlock this boss dungeon.

title: Boss Defeated
description: You have defeated this boss already. You can rechallenge bosses in the future through a perk purchase.

title: Boss Defeats
description: The amount of times you have defeated this boss.

title: Hero Already Adventuring
description: This hero is already on another adventure.

title: Hero Added To Party
description: This hero is already assigned to your party.

title: Hero Already Questing
description: This hero is already on a quest.

title: Material Gain Rate
description: Gaining #rewardAmt# material every #rewardTimeRateRound# seconds.

title: Quest Time
description: The amount of time needed to complete this quest.

title: Remaining Quest Time
description: The amount of time remaining until this quest is completed.

title: Abandon Quest
description: Abandon this quest and forfeit any rewards.

title: Expeditions
description: Expedition parties earn gold by reaching new landmarks. The speed of their travel is based on their POW, while the distance they need to travel is based on their HP.

title: Expedition Party
description: You can assign as many heroes as you want to an expedition party, as long as they aren't already adventuring in a dungeon or on an expedition. Be careful though, more heroes in a party results in stat penalties!

title: Quests Info
description: Quests have pre-defined hero setups and landmark goals. Complete quests to unlock new playbooks!

title: #title#
description: #description#

title: Additional Perks Remaining
description: The number of additional perks left in this line.

title: Auto-Sell Setting: None
description: You are currently not autoselling any rarities of this item.

title: Auto-Sell Setting: Common
description: You are currently auto-selling Common rarity for this item.

title: Auto-Sell Setting: Good and below
description: You are currently auto-selling Good and Common rarity for this item.

title: Auto-Sell Setting: Great and below
description: You are currently auto-selling Great, Good and Common rarity for this item.

title: Auto-Sell Setting: All
description: You are currently auto-selling all rarities (Epic, Great, Good and Common) of this item.

title: Cancel Crafting
description: Cancel crafting this recipe. Materials will be refunded.

title: Clear Saved Game Data
description: Permanently delete your current saved game data. This action is irreversible.

title: Import Game Data
description: Import your own previously exported data or shared game data.

title: Export Game Data
description: Export your current game data for sharing or importing at a later time.

title: Save or Load from Cloud
description: Save or load your game data from the Cloud using Playfab.

title: Settings
description: Change your game preferences and settings.

title: Development Options
description: Development and debugging options for testing various mechanics and features.

title: Experimental Beta Feature
description: This feature is experimental and may cause issues that adversely affect your gameplay experience. Please be wary of this when changing from its default value.

title: #name#
description: #description#

description:

title: Synth Booster
description: 1 Essence gives 200% game speed for 1 second. Gain more essence by desynthing rare items.

title: Essence
description: A material used by the Magical Synthesizer to transform items and speed up time. Gained from desynthesis of rare items.

title: Synth Boost Time
description: You have #remainingTime# remaining.
